firstNightReminder: Show the Strawberry either a thumbs-up or a thumbs-down.
name: Strawberry
ability: You start knowing if you are closer to a Minion than to the Demon.
flavor: Strawberry pies are supposed to have strawberries in them, dear.

firstNightReminder: Point to a good player. Put the KNOWN reminder token next to that player.
otherNightReminder: If the player Theo knows was killed by the Demon tonight, wake Theo and point to another good player. Move the KNOWN reminder token to that new player.
name: Theo
ability: You start knowing 1 good player. If the player you know dies at night, you learn another good player that night.
flavor: YOLOOOOOOOOO!!

firstNightReminder: The Feather either shakes their head 'no', or nods 'yes'. If yes, they point to 2 players. Either show them a Minion character token, or shake your head no. Mark the Feather with the NO ABILITY token.
otherNightReminder: The Feather either shakes their head 'no', or nods 'yes'. If yes, they point to 2 players. Either show them a Minion character token, or shake your head no. Mark the Feather with the NO ABILITY token.
name: Feather
ability: Once per game, at night, choose 2 players. You learn 1 Minion character you chose, or that neither are Minions.
flavor: Picture a feather floating in front of you. See it? Okay. Your breathing keeps that feather floating. Just breathe slow and steady, in and out.

otherNightReminder: The Crystal Heart either shakes their head 'no', or nods 'yes'. If yes, they die; mark them with the DEAD token, and put the NOBODY CAN DIE token in the middle of the Grimoire. That night, if anyone would die, they don't: put a WOULD DIE token on them. At the end of the night, WAKE THEM UP AGAIN!!!!!
name: Crystal Heart
ability: Once per game, at night*, you may choose to die. If you die this way, no-one else can die tonight & you learn which players would have died.
flavor:
An apparition /
Not of this world /
But because of it /
Lurking out of frame /
Awake, my heart is a fortress /
In dreams I am vulnerable.

otherNightReminder: The Swap Block either shakes their head 'no', or nods 'yes'. If yes, they point to 2 Townsfolk characters on their character sheet. If only the 1st is in play, change that player's token to the 2nd.
name: Swap Block
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose 2 Townsfolk characters (not Swap Block). If only the 1st is in play, they become the 2nd.
flavor: It's your boy Theo in this ancient temple, no big deal. #blessed

otherNightReminder: The player with the CHOSEN reminder token dies. Mark them with the DEAD reminder token. Mark the Fireball with the NO ABILITY token.
name: Fireball
ability: Once per game, during the day, publicly choose a player. Tonight, they die.
flavor:
You said you wanted to come back and explore deeper...</br>
Doesn't get any deeper than this!

otherNightReminder: If Madeline was killed by the Demon, publicly announce who Madeline is. Prompt her for a choice. If she chooses the player that killed her, that player's team loses.
name: Madeline
ability: If the Demon kills you, all players learn who you are. Then, publicly guess which player killed you. If correct, their team loses.
flavor:
Funny how we get attached to the struggle.
Promise me that you'll take care of yourself, okay?

otherNightReminder: The Bubble chooses 2 players. Mark each with a PROTECTED reminder token.
name: Bubble
ability: Each night, choose any alive player(s) (not yourself). If all are good, the Demon learns who you chose & cannot choose to kill them tonight.
flavor: How are you even breathing up here?

name: Jellyfish
ability: Each night, choose a unique player (not yourself). If they're evil, today's info is false. Each day, visit the Storyteller to learn a true statement.
flavor: Let's wake up, and we'll face this together.

firstNightReminder: The Key chooses 3 players. Mark the corresponding reminder token on them, depending on how many are evil.
otherNightReminder: The Key chooses 3 players. Mark the corresponding reminder token on them, depending on how many are evil. Give either a thumbs-up or a thumbs-down.
name: Key
ability: Each night, choose 3 players. Each night*, learn if you chose more evils than last night, but if equal, get arbitrary info.
flavor:
A glimpse at the truth is good for people.”
“Even if most can't accept what they see.”
“There's no shame in running back to your car and driving away.”
“Some day you'll be ready, then you'll come back.

firstNightReminder: The Bird chooses a player. Put a SOBER/TRUE reminder token on that player.
otherNightReminder: The Bird chooses a player. Put a SOBER/TRUE reminder token on that player.
name: Bird
ability: Each night, choose a player. Until dusk, if they are a Townsfolk, they are sober, healthy, and get true info.
flavor: You REALLY think that's just a regular bird?

otherNightReminder: If Kevin made Kevin noises today, they get their information tonight.
name: Kevin
ability: Each night*, if you publicly made Kevin noises today, learn how many different character types did. [At least 1 Outsider is in play]
flavor: AAAAAWWWARGAHGRGHARHGHGRAHGRHHRAGH!!

name: Granny
ability: The 1st time you are nominated, if the nominator neighbors evil, you are executed immediately.
flavor: But you should know, Celeste Mountain is a strange place. You might see things. Things you ain't ready to see.

firstNightReminder: The Dream Block points to a player. Mark one of their Townsfolk neighbors with the DRUNK token.
otherNightReminder: The Dream Block points to a player. Mark one of their Townsfolk neighbors with the DRUNK token.
name: Dream Block
ability: Each night, choose a player. 1 of their alive Townsfolk neighbors is drunk until dusk.
flavor: (incoherent rambling) ...I'm dreaming, aren't I?

otherNightReminder: If the Pufferfish died tonight, place the TOWNSFOLK DRUNK reminder in the middle of the Grimoire.
name: Pufferfish
ability: If you die at night, all Townsfolk are drunk until dusk.
flavor:
Aren't you worried about getting lost up here?”
“I'll figure it out.

firstNightReminder: Show Badeline a Townsfolk token. Put the ABILITY reminder token next to the player with that Townsfolk role. Put DRUNK reminder tokens on the Townsfolk & all Badelines, except for one.
name: Badeline
ability: All Badelines have the same in-play Townsfolk ability (evil learns which). All but 1 player with this ability is drunk, even if you are dead. [+1 Outsider, ? Outsiders are Badeline]
flavor:
Are you the weak Part of Me, or the lazy part?”
“I'm the pragmatic part.

otherNightReminder: If the Demon died, wake all Minions together. They point to 1 player; put them to sleep. If they pointed to Mr. Oshiro, swap the character tokens of Mr. Oshiro and the Demon, and inform them about their new characters and alignments (if applicable).
name: Mr. Oshiro
ability: If 5 or more players live & the Demon dies (ending the game), & Minions guess who you are (tonight), switch characters & alignments with the Demon.
flavor: Just passing through? This will not do.

firstNightReminder: Show the Seeker a character token. Mark that player with the KNOWN reminder token.
otherNightReminder: The Seeker points to a player. If that player has the KNOWN token, they die. Mark them with the other DEAD token. Then, show the Seeker an in-play character token. Mark that player with the KNOWN token.
name: Seeker
ability: You start knowing an alive character. Each night*, choose a player: If they are the character you know, they die & you learn another character.
flavor:
If this is all in my head, why is it so hostile?
Those THINGS are hunting me.
I'm a trespasser in my own world.

firstNightReminder: The Bumper points to an evil character on their script. If it is in play, swap the Bumper's and their character tokens. If it is a not-in-play Minion, replace the Bumper's token with the selected character token. If it is a not-in-play Demon, replace the Bumper's token with the selected character token, and swap the Demon's token for the Bumper token.
otherNightReminder: The Bumper points to an evil character on their script. If they choose a Demon and the CHOSEN DEMON reminder is placed, shake your head and gesture for them to choose again. If the character they choose is in play, swap the Bumper's and their character tokens. If it is a not-in-play Minion, replace the Bumper's token with the selected character token. If it is a not-in-play Demon, replace the Bumper's token with the selected character token, and swap the Demon's token for the Bumper token.
name: Bumper
ability: Each night, choose an evil character to be. If already in play, they become a Bumper. If a Demon is chosen (once), the Demon becomes a Bumper.
flavor:
I guess it is kind of extreme. But that's how I am.</br>
I need something to challenge me.

firstNightReminder: If a Townsfolk chooses the Spikes with their ability, mark them with the DIES TOMORROW token.
otherNightReminder: All players with DIES TOMORROW tokens die; mark them with DEAD reminder tokens. If a Townsfolk chooses the Spikes with their ability, mark them with the DIES TOMORROW token.
name: Spikes
ability: Each night*, Townsfolk who chose you with their ability last night die.
flavor: Ow. Oof. Ouchie.

firstNightReminder: The Wind chooses either clockwise or anti-clockwise. Mark them with the corresponding reminder token.
otherNightReminder: The Wind chooses either clockwise or anti-clockwise. Mark them with the corresponding reminder token.
name: Wind
ability: All players know you are in play. Each night, choose clockwise or anti-clockwise. Good abilities' targets are shifted by 1 step in that direction.
flavor:
Back off, lady. I'm heading for the summit.”
“Good luck, and mind the wind!

firstNightReminder: The Cassette chooses a Minion. Put the REGISTER DEMON reminder token on them, and the REGISTER MINION token on the Cassette.
otherNightReminder: The Cassette chooses a player: they die. Mark them with the DEAD reminder token. On odd-numbered nights, the Cassette chooses a Minion. Put the REGISTER DEMON reminder token on them, and the REGISTER MINION token on the Cassette.
name: Cassette
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. On odd-numbered nights, you register as a Minion, and a Minion (of your choice) registers as the Demon.
flavor:
One... Two... Three... Four...
One... Two... Three... Four...

otherNightReminder: The Gold Strawberry chooses a player; they die. Mark them with the DEAD reminder token. If a Minion died by execution today, they choose another player: they become an evil Minion. Put the NEW MINION token in the middle of the Grimoire.
name: Gold Strawberry
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If a Minion dies by execution (once), that night, choose a player: they become an evil Minion. [-1 Outsider]
flavor: I do not believe that it is statistically possible to get every golden strawberry without using assist mode, or cheating in some way. I kinda think that Maddy Thorson was trolling us by putting these strawberries in the game, and having no way to tell if someone is using assist mode just by looking at the screen footage. I think she knows full well that it's impossible, and the whole thing is little more than a social experiment to see how many people will cheat and then try to pass their work off as legitimate. There is no achievement or reward for getting these strawberries. You don't unlock a special ending where Theo chips a tooth on the gold strawberries in your pie. You do get a stamp of a gold strawberry on your save file if you succeed in getting all 25 gold strawberries. But PC players have already learned to hack their save slot to manipulate these stamps - including removing the assist stamp.

otherNightReminder: The Mirror points to a player: they die. Mark them with the DEAD reminder token. Mark 1 of their neighbors with the CAN MISREGISTER token.
name: Mirror
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die & 1 of their neighbors might misregister (once per night) to someone who picks them with their ability until dusk.
flavor:
...uh, why are you inside a mirror?”
“I'm pretty sure you're the one in the mirror.

otherNightReminder: The Mirror points to a player: they die. Mark them with the DEAD reminder token. If an Outsider died today, they point to another player: they are poisoned. Mark them with the POISONED reminder token.
name: The Mountain
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If an Outsider died today, choose an additional player: they are poisoned. [+1 Outsider]
flavor: Okay, Celeste Mountain might be 'weird' and 'magical'. But now you're telling me it can 'think', too?
